1.title: Salt Lake City 2010
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: So You Wanna Fight is power packed with Rough Tough Bikers, Bouncers, Brawlers, Red Necks, Ruff Necks, No Necks and Guys and Gals that "Think They're Tuff". The roughest, toughest men and women from across North America are ready to get it on. Each event is loaded with adrenaline charged grudge fights in Boxing and MMA. Lots of fun. Lots of Action and Lots of Knock-Outs. If you like non-stop Fighting this is for YOU!
imdb.title: So You Wanna Fight
plot: _So You Wanna Fight_ (qv) is power packed with Rough Tough Bikers, Bouncers, Brawlers, Red Necks, Ruff Necks, No Necks and Guys and Gals that "Think They're Tuff". The roughest, toughest men and women from across North America are ready to get it on. Each event is loaded with adrenaline charged grudge fights in Boxing and MMA. Lots of fun. Lots of Action and Lots of Knock-Outs. If you like non-stop Fighting this is for YOU!::SYWF
